articles.title: SpaceX launches 48 more Starlink internet satellites into space - United News of India
articles.description:
Los Angeles, July 8 (UNI) US private space company SpaceX launched 48 more Starlink satellites into orbit on Friday.
A Falcon 9 rocket lifted off at 12:29 p.m. Pacific Time from the Space Launch Complex at Vandenberg Space Force Base in California.
